text.title: part8_Wikinews attends 2018 Bangalore ComicCon
text.p:
( (
A
) )
So , have you watched [ Avengers ]
Infinity War
?

( (
A
) )
Do you think
Thanos
did nothing wrong ?

( (
VDR
) )
Umm .
In-teres-ting question .
Wow ! Hmm . [ Laughs ] I feel , umm , I feel there is a little bit of wrong in both sides . [ Laughs again ] .
I feel like there 're , there 's a little bit of , um ... there should be more compassion from each side . [ Laughs ]
Do you know what I mean ?

( (
A
) )
Yes .

( (
A
) )
So , if you could resurrect one character , one superhero which died in the movie , because of Thanos , whom would you resurrect ?

( (
VDR
) )
Wassat
?

( (
A
) )
Whom would you resurrect ?
Whom would you bring back to life ?

( (
VDR
) )
Gamora
! [ Laughs ]
Of course ! Is she dead though ?

( (
A
) )
What would you have done if you were not into comics ?

( (
VDR
) )
I ca n't see myself doing anything else .
You mean , nothing related to drawing ? [ ... ]
I would be a painter , if I did n't do comics I would be a painter .
But that 's kinda similar . [ Laughs ]
I would probably be into some sort of sports , because I 'm really active , physically , so . [ Laughs ]

( (
A
) )
Well , are you looking forward to watching the
Spider-Verse
movie ?

( (
VDR
) )
Yeah .
Sure ! Sure .
Spider-Man is not my favourite , but ...

( (
A
) )
But Gwenpool , oh I am sorry , Spider-Girl is coming .

( (
VDR
) )
Yeah , yeah .
She is cool .
[ Laughs ]
But I am not a big fan of the Spider-Verse , but I mean , it 's cool .
It 's interesting to watch .

( (
A
) )
Plus the way they are animating [ ... ] if you have seen the trailer [ ... ] let 's say , when he punches someone , there 's " POW !
" written in the bubbles .

( (
VDR
) )
Aah !
There is ? I have n't seen the trailer so .
That sounds cool .
[ Laughs ]

( (
A
) )
One last thing : if you had a message for your younger self , what it probably would be ?

( (
VDR
) )
Hmm .
To be more patient ! [ Laugh ]
Not be in a hurry .
And watch your thoughts .

( (
A
) )
Thanks for the interview .
Do you mind if I take a photo ?

( (
VDR
) )
No-no !
Not at all ! Yeah .

list.item:
Outside the KTPO centre .
Image :
Agastya
.

item.s: Velociraptor structure outside the ComicCon location .
Attendee sketching on a drawing tablet .
Statues of Iron Man and Captain America at the Marvel Zone .
Marvel 's Thor at the Marvel Zone .
Marvel 's Hulk and Thor at the Marvel Zone .
Games at the Amazon Prime Video zone .
